reviews.text: We loved this pension. The owner was extremely friendly, caring, and helpful. He made us feel very welcome, gave us a map and recommendations of things to do and good non-touristy restaurants. He is always personally present. The breakfast was very nice - rolls, butter, jam, cold meat and cheese, and a soft boiled egg if you want one. Our double room was cozy and very clean. The shared bathroom was fine. The location was extremely convenient to both the train station and the old town. For the price, around 50 Euro, you can't beat this place.
reviews.title: Wonderful stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: the local is clean, friendly and has a good price. the breakfast was nice, delicious.... and the people who works there is friendly, really nice people. the local is close from main atractions of the city and so close from rail station, just 2 minutes walking. Me and my wife have spended 3 nigths there last june and just one little problem: the manager lost my insulin (i am diabetic) that he took with me to keep in refrigerator. Inspite he told me that he could pay for another one if i must buy, when i send to him the bill wiht fax and email he never had answer to me untill now (december, 2006). But, this little problem do not me hide that the place is nice, the people, including the Manager, was so nice and friendly. I really loved that place, that people there, and the city. I hope to come back there one day again.
reviews.title: loved this pension

reviews.text: It's right next to the train station and historic city centre of Wurzburg. Everything is within walking distance. The rooms are simple but nice and clean and although it's next to a big street and the train ist just accross, I had a quiet room and a good nights sleep. The breakfast in the morning was in a lovely breakfast room and I felt at home with the friendly hosts there. I'd definitely recommend it to everyone, especially if you're travelling on the train.
reviews.title: Great location, clean and friendly
Passed the 3 Cs Test - Clean, Convenient, Caring
reviews.text: Excellent value for the cost when simplicity is not an issue. We'd recommend to friends and family.
